upsize.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to become larger in size, amount etc, or to make something do this
upsize.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Do you want me to upsize your fries?
upsize.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to start to use a bigger computer system than before
upsize.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The company hopes to sell to those businesses that are upsizing their applications.
upsize.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to increase the size of a company by employing more people
upsize.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The Chief Executive said that it was an upsizing merger that would help the business grow.
